front.title: A scheme for PIV visual card topography

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: The purpose of this document is to provide additional recommendations on the Personal Identity Verification (PIV) Card color-coding for designating employee affiliation. The recommendations in this document complement FIPS 201 in order to increase the reliability of PIV card visual verification.
